title: Premiere: To The Wedding – Silver Currents EP
content:
Sometimes an artists sound really hits home.

San Francisco’s Lauren Grubb a.k.a To The Wedding is one such artist, with every song she has released so far completely blowing me away. Her debut E.P Silver Currents, which we are delighted to premiere, brings together the dreamy shoegaze and all encapsulating sound that I’ve grown to love and presents it in the shape of five perfectly crafted tracks. From the drifting guitars of Come On to the crushing Set Fire, this really is how a debut release should be done. Time Pilot closes the E.P in spectacular fashion, floating through your head, bringing you back to earth after what really is a beautiful journey.

Stream the E.P below which is released 28 October.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
